CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview | Compliance Manager: Microsoft Defender for Cloud (MDC) integration
CurrentVersion.description: Compliance Manager now integrates with Microsoft Defender for Cloud, allowing customers to assess their compliance posture across Microsoft 365, Azure, Google Cloud Platform, and Amazon Web Services with resource-level testing and cloud-specific guidance.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview | Compliance Manager: Microsoft Defender for Cloud (MDC) integration
OldVersion.description: Compliance Manager now integrates with Microsoft Defender for Cloud, allowing customers to assess their compliance posture across Microsoft 365, Azure, Google Cloud Platform, and Amazon Web Services with resource-level testing and cloud-specific guidance.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Organize folders in your sidebar
CurrentVersion.description: Users can arrange folders in any desired order effortlessly by dragging and dropping the folders in the position that they want.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Organize folders in your sidebar
OldVersion.description: Users can arrange folders in any desired order effortlessly by dragging and dropping the folders in the position that they want.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Outlook for Mac - Junk/Phishing Reporting Actions Integrated with Microsoft Defender
CurrentVersion.description: The appearance and behavior of Report Phishing/Report Junk actions in Outlook for Mac can be controlled by admins using User Reported Settings in security.microsoft.com. Admins will be able to control whether these Report actions appear in Outlook, where these messages get reported to, and whether the user is prompted when they report phishing or junk. Admins will also be able to customize text and other aspects of the dialogs that appear before and after users' report phishing or junk.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Outlook for Mac - Junk/Phishing Reporting Actions Integrated with Microsoft Defender
OldVersion.description: The appearance and behavior of Report Phishing/Report Junk actions in Outlook for Mac can be controlled by admins using User Reported Settings in security.microsoft.com. Admins will be able to control whether these Report actions appear in Outlook, where these messages get reported to, and whether the user is prompted when they report phishing or junk. Admins will also be able to customize text and other aspects of the dialogs that appear before and after users' report phishing or junk.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Usage reports - Microsoft Copilot with Graph-grounded chat
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Copilot with Graph-grounded chat usage metrics will be included in the Copilot for Microsoft 365 Usage report. This new feature provides additional usage insights and informs adoption strategy decisions for Microsoft Copilot in your organization.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Usage reports - Microsoft Copilot with Graph-grounded chat
OldVersion.description: Microsoft Copilot with Graph-grounded chat usage metrics will be included in the Copilot for Microsoft 365 Usage report. This new feature provides additional usage insights and informs adoption strategy decisions for Microsoft Copilot in your organization.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Organize and reorder folders in the new Outlook for Windows and web
CurrentVersion.description: Users can arrange folders in any desired order effortlessly by dragging and dropping the folders in the position that they want. #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Organize and reorder folders in the new Outlook for Windows and web
OldVersion.description: Users can arrange folders in any desired order effortlessly by dragging and dropping the folders in the position that they want. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Microsoft Lists - Drag to order list items
CurrentVersion.description: Easily organize your list in the Microsoft Lists app by dragging and dropping items into a custom sort order for you and your team.

OldVersion.title: SharePoint: Microsoft Lists - Drag to order list items
OldVersion.description: Easily organize your list in the Microsoft Lists app by dragging and dropping items into a custom sort order for you and your team.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Workflows within File Chiclet
CurrentVersion.description: You will now be able to run instant workflows and create new file workflows via the file chiclet overflow menu (...)

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Workflows within File Chiclet
OldVersion.description: You will now be able to run instant workflows and create new file workflows via the file chiclet overflow menu (...)

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Show online archive storage in the new Outlook for Windows and Web
CurrentVersion.description: With this latest update, users can now easily view their online archive storage directly within the Outlook application. By displaying online archive storage information, users can proactively manage their email storage and make informed decisions about archiving, cleaning, and their regular and archived folders. #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Show online archive storage in the new Outlook for Windows and Web
OldVersion.description: With this latest update, users can now easily view their online archive storage directly within the Outlook application. By displaying online archive storage information, users can proactively manage their email storage and make informed decisions about archiving, cleaning, and their regular and archived folders. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Users will now be notified when their admin unblocks a requested app
CurrentVersion.description: Users on teams will be notified when their IT Admin unblocks an app that was previously requested by the user.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Users will now be notified when their admin unblocks a requested app
OldVersion.description: Users on teams will be notified when their IT Admin unblocks an app that was previously requested by the user.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Avatar interaction improvements in Immersive space view
CurrentVersion.description: Introducing more avatar reactions and personal boundary on avatars.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Avatar interaction improvements in Immersive space view
OldVersion.description: Introducing more avatar reactions and personal boundary on avatars.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Intelligent meeting recap with AI-generated notes and tasks for GCC environments
CurrentVersion.description: Enabling AI-generated notes and tasks within the intelligent meeting recap experience for GCC customers, expanding on the features within intelligent recap that are already available to GCC customers today (personalized timeline markers, speaker timeline markers, chapters, and topics).

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Intelligent meeting recap with AI-generated notes and tasks for GCC environments
OldVersion.description: Enabling AI-generated notes and tasks within the intelligent meeting recap experience for GCC customers, expanding on the features within intelligent recap that are already available to GCC customers today (personalized timeline markers, speaker timeline markers, chapters, and topics).

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Text and UI resizing for Teams Rooms on Windows
CurrentVersion.description: IT admins can adjust the size of the text and all other UI elements on the front-of-room display by changing the display scaling settings. Text and UI elements are resized and adjusted for all supported display resolution and scaling combinations (1080p resolution at 100-150% scaling, 4K resolution at 100-300% scaling). This capability is extended to support touch boards.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Text and UI resizing for Teams Rooms on Windows
OldVersion.description: IT admins can adjust the size of the text and all other UI elements on the front-of-room display by changing the display scaling settings. Text and UI elements are resized and adjusted for all supported display resolution and scaling combinations (1080p resolution at 100-150% scaling, 4K resolution at 100-300% scaling). This capability is extended to support touch boards.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: SharePoint Embed Support for Teams town hall
CurrentVersion.description: Users can now embed Teams town halls in the SharePoint sites they manage. This capability allows town hall attendees to watch the event instance within a particular SharePoint site.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: SharePoint Embed Support for Teams town hall
OldVersion.description: Users can now embed Teams town halls in the SharePoint sites they manage. This capability allows town hall attendees to watch the event instance within a particular SharePoint site.

CurrentVersion.title: Planner: New Microsoft Planner App for Teams in GCC
CurrentVersion.description: The new Microsoft Planner app in Teams is a single, unified work management experience. It brings together the simplicity of To Do, the collaboration of Planner and the power of Project for the web into a single and simple solution, that offers individual task management, collaborative work management as well as enterprise work management.

OldVersion.title: Planner: New Microsoft Planner App for Teams in GCC
OldVersion.description: The new Microsoft Planner app in Teams is a single, unified work management experience. It brings together the simplicity of To Do, the collaboration of Planner and the power of Project for the web into a single and simple solution, that offers individual task management, collaborative work management as well as enterprise work management.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Import and export support for data files in Outlook
CurrentVersion.description: This feature adds support for importing PST files into Outlook for Mac. Support for OLM data files will include both importing and exporting data.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Import and export support for data files in Outlook
OldVersion.description: This feature adds support for importing PST files into Outlook for Mac. Support for OLM data files will include both importing and exporting data.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Amplify - Copy a publication within a campaign
CurrentVersion.description: Gone are the days where you must rewrite or manually copy and paste content from an old publication to a newly drafted one to reuse it. Soon in Viva Amplify, you will be able to copy a publication within an existing campaign with just a few clicks. This new feature streamlines the content creation process, enabling communicators to easily reuse existing content across SharePoint, Outlook, and Teams, including all channel-specific customizations and related audiences, saving you time and effort.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Amplify - Copy a publication within a campaign
OldVersion.description: Gone are the days where you must rewrite or manually copy and paste content from an old publication to a newly drafted one to reuse it. Soon in Viva Amplify, you will be able to copy a publication within an existing campaign with just a few clicks. This new feature streamlines the content creation process, enabling communicators to easily reuse existing content across SharePoint, Outlook, and Teams, including all channel-specific customizations and related audiences, saving you time and effort.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Connections News Notifications in Gov Clouds
CurrentVersion.description:
With this release, existing news notifications in Viva Connections will now be available in GCC, GCCH and DoD. News notifications are delivered via Microsoft Teams in the desktop, mobile, and web environments in the following scenarios: News is published to a SharePoint team or communication site a user follows or by someone a user works closely with.
News is boosted. Someone comments on a new News post. Someone "Likes" a News post. Someone is @mentioned in a comment on a news post.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Connections News Notifications in Gov Clouds
OldVersion.description:
With this release, existing news notifications in Viva Connections will now be available in GCC, GCCH and DoD. News notifications are delivered via Microsoft Teams in the desktop, mobile, and web environments in the following scenarios: News is published to a SharePoint team or communication site a user follows or by someone a user works closely with.
News is boosted. Someone comments on a new News post. Someone "Likes" a News post. Someone is @mentioned in a comment on a news post.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Speed dial customization on line keys for non-touch phones
CurrentVersion.description: Quickly access frequently dialed contacts and numbers with the ability to set up custom contacts and speed dial on the line key buttons and sidecars for non-touch phone devices certified for Microsoft Teams. This feature will enable one-touch dialing capabilities and easy management of contact lists on line keys and sidecars.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Speed dial customization on line keys for non-touch phones
OldVersion.description: Quickly access frequently dialed contacts and numbers with the ability to set up custom contacts and speed dial on the line key buttons and sidecars for non-touch phone devices certified for Microsoft Teams. This feature will enable one-touch dialing capabilities and easy management of contact lists on line keys and sidecars.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Start/stop recording on Teams Rooms on Windows
CurrentVersion.description: When attending a meeting in a Teams Rooms on Windows, users can now start or stop recording without having to join on their companion device. The start/stop recording button will be available as long as the meeting organizer is not a designated resource account. This feature is available Teams Rooms Pro.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Voice isolation on MacOS
CurrentVersion.description: With voice isolation, you can enjoy clear and uninterrupted calls or meetings, no matter where you are. Voice isolation is an AI based advanced noise suppression feature that eliminates unwanted background noise including other human voices. The technology recognizes your voice profile and ensures only your voice is transmitted. Voice isolation can be enabled for calls and meetings and will now be available on MacOS.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Choose how many days of emails sync to your device for offline usage
CurrentVersion.description: With the new sync window, you can choose how many days' worth of emails and attachments you want to download to your device so you can always access them even while offline.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview | Compliance Manager: Microsoft Defender for Cloud (MDC) integration
CurrentVersion.description: Compliance Manager now integrates with Microsoft Defender for Cloud, allowing customers to assess their compliance posture across Microsoft 365, Azure, Google Cloud Platform, and Amazon Web Services with resource-level testing and cloud-specific guidance.
